readable.title: 2089542487_b4c1ee7025
readable.content: A hiker is ready to take on a rugged outdoor trail . a lone hiker on a dirt hiking trail with a hat and sunglasses on with trees in the background A man in shorts is hiking in a dry region . A man stops for a picture with the scenery during his hike . The man is posing for a picture in the desert wearing a green shirt and hat , and holding a metal detector .
